DOC.brief_summary: Dysmenorrhea ( painful menstruation ) common gynaecological disorder prevalent 50 % woman reproductive year . Primary dysmenorrhea describe cyclic uterine pain without identifiable underlying cause . Menstrual pain result consequence endometrial ischemia , high level prostaglandins inflammatory mediator . Conventional treatment primary dysmenorrhea consist non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug oral contraceptive , may adverse effect . Viburnum opulus ( Cramp bark ) homoeopathic remedy well indicated treatment dysmenorrhea . While study use Viburnum opulus herbal form , research assess efficacy homoeopathic form . The aim study determine efficacy Viburnum opulus 3X treatment primary dysmenorrhea measure modify Short Form McGill pain questionnaire ( SF-MPQ-2 ) visual analogue scale ( VAS ) respectively .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Viburnum Opulus 3X Treatment Primary Dysmenorrhea
DOC.detailed_description: This double blind placebo control study , involve 30 female participant . The study run 3 month , 3 menstrual cycle shall determine length participant menstrual cycle . The participant assess 3 menstrual event . Consultations take place private set Homoeopathic Health Centre Doornfontein campus , supervision register homoeopath . Participants recruit advertisement place University Johannesburg Health Centre locate Doornfontein campus , relevant permission obtain . The researcher explain study participant well provide participant consent form sign , may take part study . Participants screen general physical examination conduct asses participant 's general wellbeing . Each participant issue modify Short Form McGill questionnaire Visual Analogue Scale complete . Participants instruct complete form begin experience pain cramping . No medication give initial consultation . During second follow-up consultation participant return complete form give initial consultation . Each participant issue 50 ml bottle homoeopathic remedy placebo new form ( SF-MPQ-2 VAS ) complete . Participants advise take 10 drop remedy three time day start experience pain cramping . The form additionally need complete time . The participant advise stop homoeopathic remedy pain cramp cease . This process repeat third fourth consultation . During final consultation participant return last form researcher . The participant measure subjective satisfaction medicine pain complete five point treatment satisfaction scale . The data statistically analyse researcher aid statistician . This do use non-parametric Friedmann test ( measure difference within group ) Mann-Whitney test ( measure differences group ) well repeat measure ANOVA . These test evaluate change severity symptoms time . The possible benefit participate study may include improvement symptom primary dysmenorrhea . This study contribute medical knowledge efficacy clinical management primary dysmenorrhea .
DOC.criteria: Females 1835 year . Have history painful menstruation . Are form hormonal contraceptive . Have intra uterine contraceptive device . Have prediagnosed endometriosis , chronic pelvic inflammatory disease , uterine fibroid , polycystic ovarian syndrome know cause secondary dysmenorrhea . Suffers serious chronic disease .
